definitions: the quality of moving or operating at a low speed

examples.text: Elizabeth made her way upstairs with painful slowness

shortDefinitions: quality of moving or operating at low speed

definitions: the quality of taking a long time

examples.text: the minutes passed with agonizing slowness
people complained about the slowness of the service

shortDefinitions: quality of taking a long time

definitions: lack of understanding or intellect; dullness

examples.text: he was mocked for his slowness in class
